name: Lollapalooza Chicago 2024
description: Lollapalooza is a 4-Day music festival happening July 30 - August 2, 2024 at Grant Park in Chicago, IL. We are excited to announce that Lollapalooza will be returning to its original 4-Day format July 30 - August 2, 2024! We canâ€™t wait to see you in Grant Park!
